website_summaries.verdict: The Vionic Dash acquired favorable general feedback for its lightweight nature, supportive and comfortable construction, and trendy design. However, not everyone was pleased with the features the shoe had to offer. It was criticized for its narrow width as well as inadequate cushioning and arch support. Regardless of the issues, it was still deemed a solid contender in the market of walking footwear.
pros: A majority of users expressed contentment with how lightweight the Vionic Dash was
Numerous buyers commended its supportive build
The comfortable feel of the shoe earned a lot of acclaim from plenty of purchasers
Its stylish appearance appealed to various reviewers
The footgear was claimed true to size as per a few testers
Many wearers admired its easy slip-on feature
cons: Some critics were disappointed because of its insufficient arch support
Several users complained about the narrow width
The Vionic Dash failed to meet the expectations of a couple of purchasers since it lacked cushioning
A small number of wearers thought the footgear was not worth the price

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. I have plantar facitis and achilles tendonitis so always in pain. These shoes lessen that pain a lot. I'm on feet all day at work and don't feel exhausted when I get home. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: atntprod

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I bought these
customer_reviews.text: I have two pair of Vionic sandals, and they help me stay on my feet so much longer without the usual aches and pains. I wanted to try some Vionic sneakers to see if they also help my feet. They absolutely do! Also, the wide width is just right and comfortable for my wide feet. I'm so glad I bought these Vionic sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: EsTe

customer_reviews.title: A Keeper
customer_reviews.text: Put them on right out of the box - had 5 errands to run plus some shopping - my feet felt fine when I got home. I just wish the ball/toe area of the sole had a bit more cushioning. But if I were sightseeing, these would be on my feet the whole trip. They fit true to my size (6.5).
customer_reviews.author: Bostonian

customer_reviews.title: I ordered my regular size in this shoe. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my regular size in this shoe. It was actually too big. So I sent them back and ordered the next size smaller. The smaller ones fit perfectly. Wore them to the zoo recently and they served their purpose well. I did a lot of walking there and my feet were thankful that I wore these shoes. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Batey

customer_reviews.title: No, no, no
customer_reviews.text: These fit true to size for 8.5 Wide; however, the arch support was not any better than a regular pair of sneakers, and no matter how tight I made the instep strap, I couldn't get the heel to stop slipping up and down when I walked. Not worth keeping due to the high price tag. Returned and my search continues for a good-quality shoe that not only fits my wide foot, but also gives excellent high-arch support.
customer_reviews.author: MagMar

customer_reviews.title: Supportive & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Another pair of Vionics that I love. Put them on right out of the box & wore them for about 8 hours. I actually forgot they were on. The arch is high & perfect (for my high-arched feet). I wear them sock less, but will probably need a low tennis sock for summer - the interior nylon makes my feet really hot. But the Vionic arch is why I own 25 pairs of this brand. Always supportive & comfortable. Totally Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bostonian

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes; so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Never had to break these in. They felt so comfortable from day one. I have high arches and they give me excellent support. I bought these right before I had my hip replaced. I used them almost every day after my surgery. Loved wearing them for P.T. When I went to Europe wore these every day. I love this style with the velcro across the top. I don't have to unstrap them every time. I can slip them on and they stay snuggle, but comfortably on my feet. I wish Vionics still carried this style. I love the so much I'd by more of them for when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: They’re so comfortable but rather wide at the toe area
customer_reviews.text: They’re so comfortable but rather wide at the toe area. They feel a tad too big but I might keep them unless I find them in a narrower width. I’m a true 91/2. The 9 will probably be too tight. But really comfortable and good support in the arch.
customer_reviews.author: Beulah

customer_reviews.title: Little roomy
customer_reviews.text: These are a little roomy for me but the toebox is almond shaped and small/flat so i do not think I could size down without squashing my toes. I need to wear socks with them to take up some of the room. I also added a heel insert to raise up my heels. They are a little flat for me. The arch support is really good and better once I added the heel insert. I have been buying skechers go walks for the past few years and I love them but they wear out so quickly and lose all support. I think these will last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Love Vionics" Dash" is Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing Fit! I have many pairs of Vionic shoes, I love them. This pair did not fit as I expected. They were too large in the heel and slipped up and down as I walked. I tried using the crossover elastic to make the shoe tighter and that didn't work. The elastic was flimsy and weak to try to adjust the fit. Disappointing fit and material used (elastic) in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: katiegee

customer_reviews.title: This shoe fits fine but is not as comfortable as Vionic Sunset Mary ...
customer_reviews.text: After trying these out for a week or so, they fell below expectation and I returned them. They are not as comfortable as other Vionic shoes I have purchased and the closure is annoying. The price of $99 is unreasonable, especially since these are billed as a walking shoe, which they are not.
customer_reviews.author: AE Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable, but just not for me
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing wrong with these shoes. They were very light weight and comfortable. I just didn't like the styling when I tried them on, I found them a bit fuddy and boring. The other thing is the material that the soles are made out of. Instead of rubber, it's a synthetic, plastic kind of material. I find that this stuff is terrible for static electric shocks. Returned them
customer_reviews.author: Melodramie

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are wonderfully comfortable - right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are wonderfully comfortable - right out of the box. I have high arches and issues with the backs of my heels, but these Vionics make my feet feel great!
customer_reviews.author: jenjen&cord

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn’t matter , you should be able to exchange for a correct size
customer_reviews.text: Got as s gift, but the return date was before I received them, now I can’t send them back to exchange for a wide instead of a reg. , these totaled 121.00 and I can’t where them 🙈ugh!!!! I am pissed!!!!!! Still waiting to here from a manager, I have already contacted vionic, no help there either 🙈🙈🙈🙈🙈🙈🙈
customer_reviews.author: apple

customer_reviews.title: 6.5 wide did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I liked these shoes. the comfort, material, velcro attachment on top. I have to have very good arch support, but I have a high instep so the top of my foot is higher than most. For that reason, the velcro could not stretch far enough to attach. I have another pair of 6.5 wide Vionic tennis shoes that lace up that I like. This pair did not work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Vionic shoes but their cute casual styles are hit and miss every year. But I am so happy I found these shoe! I was looking for a Vionic slip on that was comfortable to wear, cute to wear every day and easy to put on and stay on my foot. I found it! I am sold! I love this shoe and hope to buy the other colors soon. I wear a 6.5 and its fit my foot perfectly and my feet have broken into the shoes with success and no pain.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive, but nice quality. I have a little wider foot. These shoes fit very well and are comfortable. Who ever delivered these shoes, threw the package in the ditch close to my mailbox and we have a very long driveway. I was lucky my $$$shoes were not stollen. This may not be the companys problem. But this has never happened before.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have an awful time finding comfortable sneakers. I bought these Vionic Dash shoes for a two week trip that I knew would involve a lot of walking. Normally, sneakers leave me with sore arches and ankles, but these do not. They're roomy, comfortable, and slip on. If I wear heavier socks, or my feet are a bit swollen, I can easily release the elastic across the arches for custom comfort.
customer_reviews.author: RABB2

customer_reviews.title: I loved the shoe but it runs smaller than other bionic ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoe but it runs smaller than other bionic shoes that I've ordered in the past. I ordered a size 8 an they were to small. I may reorder a size 81/2 since I really loved the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Feel great
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and look nice. I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: B.O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Stands out for comfort
customer_reviews.text: They’re very cute and comfortable. I got them to be my new pair of indoor shoes (I usually alternate between two pair of indoor shoes bc I’m a SAHM with reoccurring plantar fasciitis flare ups). They’re not quite as comfortable as the bionic orthaheel Mary James I’ve bought, but they’re still way better than my ryka, easy spirit, comfortfusse, or therafit options I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully comfortable and good looking AND expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes -- super comfortable with good support. Also looks great. I'm not sure how long they will last though - the fabric on back and around the ankle looks like will tear and fray easily. These were a bit on the pricey side for me, so I hope that equals durable/long lasting as well as comfortable and great for my feet! Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: mchap

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7 W to have room for a bunion and the shoes felt fine at first. So I wore them outside and can't return them. Now I feel like I should have gotten a 7 1/2 W even though I usually wear a 6 1/2 W in most shoes. The width was okay but they are too short. Very disappointed especially as they were expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: This brand has an elastic strap closure but in a zigzag style that looks good the tongue is wide and doesn't slip shoe.slips on
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this brand of shoe I had bunion surgery on the 15th of August. After the second week I was told I could wear supportive shoes. I did not want ugly support shoes. I saw these and they were good looking sports shoe that my doctor was impressed with as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Width is slightly narrow, but can be adjusted with Velcro flaps! Fits perfectly now. Used it everywhere in CA and NY. Loved it so much, I bought a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Book girl

customer_reviews.title: These are PHENOMENAL! I suffer with planter fasciitis and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are PHENOMENAL! I suffer with planter fasciitis and these sneakers definitely help. Most sneakers squeeze my pinky toes but these do not. Combined with Vionic slippers for my house, my feet are grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expect in Vionic
customer_reviews.text: Felt cheaply made, not good support and definitely not the quality I would expect from Vionic.
customer_reviews.author: DC Man

customer_reviews.title: I wanted the easy on and off of the velcro but I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the easy on and off of the velcro but I have a narrow foot and it doesn't have enough velcro to tighten the shoe very much. I can wear it as is, but a little more ability to adjust the shoe would have been better. The arch support seems to be good, but I can't tighten it enough to really get all the benefit of the support. They will probably become my garden shoes pretty soon.
customer_reviews.author: deborah dudley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Am terribly disappointed in the last 2 pairs of Vionic shoes. The 9 is too big and the 8 1/2 too small. Guess I’ll have to find a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable from the time I put them on. Great for plantar fasciitis. In fact, have sandals and houseshoes from Vionics also
customer_reviews.author: Rjeangels

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, my second pair!!!
customer_reviews.text: General cadu as long wear Vionic makes great shoes of all kinds. This is my fitness shoe. Ordered up 1/2 size.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Great for sore feet
customer_reviews.text: These really help with P.F. They are binding around the top of the foot. I have two pair and I'm going to order the 3rd pair to mow the lawn in.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Abe

customer_reviews.title: but had been very unsuccessful in finding a comfortable pair of shoes to wear around the house and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no Arch on my left foot and have dealt with pain, but had been very unsuccessful in finding a comfortable pair of shoes to wear around the house and for walking. I have other foot issues which make a good fit very difficult, but this shoe is perfect! Very comfortable and within 3 days, my foot pain is gone! I am so impressed with this shoe that I have already ordered another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: PatC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light-weight.
customer_reviews.text: Very, very light-weight shoe! So comfortable. I wear this shoe every day since I bought it. Will be purchasing other Vionic shoes in the future!
customer_reviews.author: J. Rucker

customer_reviews.title: No support or help for planters fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Got them for work shoes since I am on my feet 8 hours a day. They are not bad looking but they in no way measure up to the adleys. They have barely any arch support at all and since you no longer carry adley I must find something comparable.
customer_reviews.author: jnette

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe but the fit isn't exactly what I need. I am a true 5 1/2 but Vionic only offers size 5 or size 6. The 5 was too small and the 6 was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great walking sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Length is perfect - width is just a tad tight but I know they will stretch out. I love the fact that they are slip-ons. Easy on and easy off. Great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: These slip-on shoes by Vionic are very comfortable and I like the arch
customer_reviews.text: These slip-on shoes by Vionic are very comfortable and I like the arch. Although the width is far too big because I wear a 4A. I wear heavy socks and they are wearable. I wish companies would make shoes in smaller widths.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne H.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible. Fit is way off and cheaply made. I returned!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have planters fasciitis and these are great for around the house and errands. If you are on your feet for long periods of time they are not that great. Definitely not for serious walking.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Half size larger than my vionic flip flops, fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the support. I'm a hairdresser, on my feet all day. My feet are 90% better when wearing this brand of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Shrerrill Graff owner Creative Salon and Spa

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable but not as cute
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good, comfortable but not as cute as I would like. It does what it should do for errands, gym or a walk without aches and pains.
customer_reviews.author: rjr96762

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable and does has great support. It is light weight . Ordered normal size and fit perfectly. Can't wait for the snow to melt so that I can wear them more often outside.
customer_reviews.author: 2pomsmom

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for surgery plantars faciaites flat arches pro ating
customer_reviews.text: The best fitting orthodics shoes over the counter. Better than insoles. I am recovering from 6 foot and ankle surgeries. These allow me to walk longer with less pain.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on, comfortable and well-made.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very comfortable and eased my plantar fasciitis pain. I was able to stay on my feet all day. It’s easy to put on and I don’t need to worry about laces becoming undone. I just ordered another pair, different color.
customer_reviews.author: Carlin Lau

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and well constructed. Got a lot of comments from friends and coworkers. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Finally i got them, they look so nice, fit me almost fine, like the colors and the model, im happy with this shoes, i hope they help me with my foot sometimes in pain.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Carvajal

customer_reviews.title: Great Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very Good orthopedic support for knees and back. Spend the time to get used to wearing them and they will become your favorite walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: ... as the Velcro doesn’t stretch out they will be fine. A little overpriced and nothing special but was ...
customer_reviews.text: As long as the Velcro doesn’t stretch out they will be fine. A little overpriced and nothing special but was encouraged to try because of insoles.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes. Will buy more. No break in period at all. Nor sore feet or legs at the end of a 5 day trip to Walt Disney world.
customer_reviews.author: LadyVal

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: Love these Vionic slip on athletic shoes! So comfortable, and well made. I really like the design, I can get them on and off easily with the Velcro tab closure. A happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robin S.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are extremely comfortable and great for long walks. They give a great amount of support to your foot and ankle with the heal cup. Since buying the slip on sneaker I have also purchased a pair of ankle boots from Vionic and am very happy with the quality and comfort. I would highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: stacy

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: The design is cute but it was too tight for me
customer_reviews.author: Birdmix

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, their great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our trip to Israel and they worked out great! If your looking for a great shoe get these!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Spitalnick

customer_reviews.title: Love Vionic
customer_reviews.text: Love Vionic but have a hard to find my size
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Saunders

customer_reviews.title: I really like the lightness of the shoes and look better than ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the lightness of the shoes and look better than regular sneakers when out and about. Only thing I don’t like is my heels slipping a little. Will wear thicker socks or assume my feet will swell a little as warmer weather comes.
customer_reviews.author: M. G. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe fits true to size is a little snug but will stretch on the top of the foot. I do have a higher arch though.
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with Vionic!
customer_reviews.text: This a great shoe and slips on with ease. It provides comfort all day long. I appreciate the wide size to accommodate bunions.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Nygard

customer_reviews.title: Stylish vionic
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, except there doesn't seem to be as much support as usual, especially with the right shoe. Heels slip a little as the back seems lower than normal. I'm sure a heel grip can fix that. Will wear them at home for a little while to see if I keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Good Shopping Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker has the good support expected from Vionic. Very comfortable and fit (8 M) is perfect. Great shoes for shopping!
customer_reviews.author: KayB

customer_reviews.title: Wish I made this in a narrow
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty sneaker, but it is too wide for me across the ball of my foot. I had to try several inserts to get it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: SBBinALA

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe but it seems narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't wear a wide width. But this shoes seems narrow and is not available in the wide size.
customer_reviews.author: Ready to travel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These meet my expectations and beyond, I’m so thrilled , I haven’t been able to walk this well without back pain in years . Thank God for Vionic
customer_reviews.author: Kathy R.

customer_reviews.title: Sigh...the elastic strap...l
customer_reviews.text: That elastic cuts right across my foot at the exact location of my bunion. Need I say more?
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I am on my feet 6-8 hours a day. No aching feet. They look nice too!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: The BEST BRAND shoes for anyone managing Plantar Fachiatis!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this particular style, just a different color; but my 9th pair of Vionics overall - love, love, love, them all!
customer_reviews.author: BoogiesMom13

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t feel the arch support was as good as my other vionics. But comfortable
customer_reviews.author: kulagirl

customer_reviews.title: Not as usable as other vionic shoes for me.
customer_reviews.text: These just did not work out. The Velcro offered little in the way of adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous722

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly comfortable! Great arch support and stylish! Buy with comfort here!
customer_reviews.author: sem

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Just as described.Cute for casual attires, great support.Love the Vionic brand.
customer_reviews.author: MS FM

customer_reviews.title: very confy
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet, so using the standard run of the mill tennis shoes started to take a toll on me, so I bought these. And let me tell you these shoes are comfy. In fact, I love them so much I bought a second pair to wear outside of work.
customer_reviews.author: TheGman

customer_reviews.title: I did not wear the shoes; I found that ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not wear the shoes; I found that they gape in the arch area after trying the shoes on and they were somewhat large.
customer_reviews.author: Erma Posey

customer_reviews.title: Love Vionic. Their shoes are so comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Love Vionic. Their shoes are so comfortable and supportive. These sneakers are super cute and perfect for running errands. I normally wear a 6.5, but in vionic I wear a 7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I’ve worn these for 12-14 hours a day and they’re just as comfortable at the end of the day as the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: THESE SHOES ARE A BLESSING!
customer_reviews.text: I AM ABSOLUTELY LIVING IN THESE!!! SOO COMFORTABLE! JUST BOUGHT ANOTHER PAIR! (THINKING AHEAD...)
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mc

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with cuff or rolled up jeans
customer_reviews.text: Wore two times and got some compliments from strangers in passing. Looks great with cuff or rolled up jeans.Look very stylish and good support?
customer_reviews.author: Nancy in Leesburg, GA

customer_reviews.title: Love Vionic shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love Vionic shoes. But these are amazing. I own two pair and I switch off from day to day. These are so light, comfy and easy to slip in and out of. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: diana hall

customer_reviews.title: Vionic Tennis Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Some reason the right foot shoe hurts my toes. Was very disappointed in them.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Ponthieux

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is the one for when you are on your feet all day. Even room for my wide toes.
customer_reviews.author: River

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit & Feels like I’m walking on air
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. This is the most comfortable shoe I have put on in over a decade! These will be the only shoes I purchase going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great arch support but need to make velcro closure more adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Misc

customer_reviews.title: Supportively and comfortable casual sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and stylish for running errands or walking the dog. Great with demon, navy or white.
customer_reviews.author: Susan KD

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for in a supportive walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable walking shoes I've tried. Good insole support, attractive style.
customer_reviews.author: Jitterbug

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for bad feet
customer_reviews.text: Vionic is one of few brands that works for me because of planters fasciatis.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Barden

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I've had plantar fasciitis for years and these shoes really help. Very comfortable and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: They fit very well and easy to get into bead able to put them on ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit very well and easy to get into bead able to put them on and wear without breaking in
customer_reviews.author: Carol C. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe. I use it for walking the dog and just everyday wear. It is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen jaworski

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe as I expected. Vionic shoes are all I wear any more due to my flat feet. Needed something I could slip on and these are perfect. Maybe not beautiful to look at but very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Richey

customer_reviews.title: They are like wearing bedroom slippers.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip I am taking. Put them on to break in. Didn’t need to do that. They are like wearing bedroom slippers. Just got back from a trip to Paris, lots of walking. They were a God send.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Wasser

customer_reviews.title: Best sneaker ever!
customer_reviews.text: I only wear Vionic shoes. I ordered these for walking. They are amazingly supportive and lightweight. I would order another pair if they had them in my size.
customer_reviews.author: Maria B.

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and good looks
customer_reviews.text: soft, holds my orthotics nicely and looks lovely with my jeans
customer_reviews.author: RGL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I love that they are easy to get on!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sneakers
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best pair of sneakers I've ever worn. They are light, easy to put on and off, cute and the arch support is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DMM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as I was facing knee surgery and wanted shoes that were easy to slip on and off and gave me excellent support while I had to go through physical therapy. These sneakers were perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: Mei

customer_reviews.title: but still very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat wider than the Riley Casual Sneaker, but still very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But I do love them.
customer_reviews.text: Thought they wood have little more support. But I do love them.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Love these shors
customer_reviews.text: Love Vionic I have 2 pairs of these plus 4 sandals and 2 wedges. Have made my life so pain free
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: They run small.
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe but unfortunately it was too tight even when it was my size. They run small. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: zokie

customer_reviews.title: Can walk all day in them
customer_reviews.text: I love the arch support, they are so comfortable. I have a chronic back degeneration and foot problems. These shoes are great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lissette

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe, love the color!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes; they fit nicely wearing thin low profile booties.
customer_reviews.author: BoogiesMom13

product_meta.title: Vionic Women's Brisk Dash Slip-on Sneaker
product_meta.description: As it's name would suggest,Brisk Dash is a must-have for the girl on the go. Dash stays put thanks to an adjustable elastic strap with hook-and-loop closure, while a low-profile athletic EVA midsole ensures that feet stay supported all day long.
feature_bullets: Vionic offers innovative biomechanical technology concealed in every style, so you can enjoy all life’s occasions with confidence and comfort – all day, every day.
